title: ernesto nam
main_content: ernesto nam i'm a junior at stanford doing computer science / ai track. i have a deep interest in tech. some areas that excite me are consumer applications of gen ai, productivity tools, some new type of social, among others. i also think about some more structural problems like why international shipping is always hard and how traffic lights can be a source of more efficient transportation systems. i took two gap years before stanford. i enjoy reading, the neuroscience of learning, doing almost all kinds of sports, the mildly sunny california weather, and exploring. recently, i started finding joy in experimenting recommended eating spots and figured that so much of how i feel about new places that i visit is influenced by the food i eat (and of course the people too). currrently based in palo alto. i'm paraguayan, korean, and brazilian by heart (brasileiro de coração). i'm very fond of all four. Reach out any time: [ namernesto at gmail dot com ] ▼ projects things i've dedicated a lot of time to (and still believe in) blank - a social reading app blank v0 - a web app that converts articles into podcasts ai deck - a 0 to 1 presentation about gen ai for executives in brazil jobi - linkedin for blue-collar workers in latin america edus - cohort-based courses as a new type of university englobar - a bunch of social projects in paraguay ▼ jobs official and unofficial work I've done swe @ amazon (alexa) a bit of everything @ forfeit (yc w23) swe @ hashdex biz dev @ cloud humans (yc w21) writing investment memos for some angel investors content creator @ tract a few things @ latin american leadership academy sourcing and due diligence @ idb lab build houses and fundraise @ techo tutoring kids and high-schoolers
